Heading: Copies
Note: Maximum number of copies that may be made of a permitted extract

Heading: Characters
Note: Maximum number of characters in a permitted extract for a specified usage

Heading: Words
Note: Maximum number of words in a permitted extract for a specified usage

Heading: Pages
Note: Maximum number of pages in a permitted extract for a specified usage

Heading: Percentage
Note: Maximum percentage of total content in a permitted extract for a specified usage

Heading: Devices
Note: Maximum number of devices in ‘share group’

Heading: Concurrent users
Note: Maximum number of concurrent users. NB where the number of concurrent users is specifically not limited, set the number of concurrent users to zero

Heading: Users
Note: Maximum number of licenced individual users, independent of concurrency of use

Heading: Concurrent classes
Note: A ‘class’ is a group of learners attending a specific course or lesson and generally taught as a group

Heading: Classes
Note: Maximum number of classes of learners, independent of concurrency of use

Heading: Percentage per time period
Note: Maximum percentage of total content which may be used in a specified usage per time period; the time period being specified as another <EpubUsageLimit> Quantity

Heading: Days
Note: Maximum time period in days (beginning from product purchase or activation)

Heading: Weeks
Note: Maximum time period in weeks

Heading: Months
Note: Maximum time period in months

Heading: Hours minutes and seconds
Note: Maximum about of time in hours, minutes and seconds allowed in a permitted extract for a specified usage, in the format HHHMMSS (7 digits, with leading zeros if necessary)

Heading: Days (fixed start)
Note: Maximum time period in days (beginning from the product publication date). In effect, this defines a fixed end date for the license independent of the purchase or activation date

Heading: Weeks (fixed start)
Note: Maximum time period in weeks

Heading: Months (fixed start)
Note: Maximum time period in months

Heading: Times
Note: Maximum number of times a specified usage event may occur (in the lifetime of the product)

Heading: Times per day
Note: Maximum frequency a specified usage event may occur (per day)

Heading: Times per month
Note: Maximum frequency a specified usage event may occur (per month)

Heading: Times per year
Note: Maximum frequency a specified usage event may occur (per year)

Heading: Dots per inch
Note: Maximum resolution of printed or copy/pasted extracts

Heading: Dots per cm
Note: Maximum resolution of printed or copy/pasted extracts

Heading: Allowed usage start page
Note: Page number where allowed usage begins. <Quantity> should contain an absolute page number, counting the cover as page 1. (This type of page numbering should not be used where the e-publication has no fixed pagination). Use with (max number of) Pages, Percentage of content, or End page to specify pages allowed in Preview

Heading: Allowed usage end page
Note: Page number at which allowed usage ends. <Quantity> should contain an absolute page number, counting the cover as page 1. (This type of page numbering should not be used where the e-publication has no fixed pagination). Use with Start page to specify pages allowed in a preview

Heading: Allowed usage start time
Note: Time at which allowed usage begins. <Quantity> should contain an absolute time, counting from the beginning of an audio or video product, in the format HHHMMSS or HHHMMSScc. Use with Time, Percentage of content, or End time to specify time-based extract allowed in Preview

Heading: Allowed usage end time
Note: Time at which allowed usage ends. <Quantity> should contain an absolute time, counting from the beginning of an audio or video product, in the format HHHMMSS or HHHMMSScc. Use with Start time to specify time-based extract allowed in Preview

Heading: Valid from
Note: The date from which the usage constraint applies. <Quantity> is in the format YYYYMMDD

Heading: Valid to
Note: The date until which the usage constraint applies. <Quantity> is in the format YYYYMMDD
